data.title: Marton Csokas Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Marton Csokas with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Became interested in acting while studying art history and American literature at university

Played George in Sydney's Belvoir Street Theatre's 2007 production of Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?, a role for which he was nominated for a Best Actor in a Lead Role at the 2007 Sydney Theatre Awards

Spent two days in makeup to cover his body in tattoos for his role in The Equalizer (2014)
